page_content:
Composite Master Reset

Version:MissionOS_2.0

This feature performs the following functions:

  1. Deletes composite master readings,
  2. Deletes any blogs related to that master or its children,
  3. Recalculates the child and master readings.

For resetting the composite master data, first log into MissionOS. Open Data Manager. Go to System Management > Utilities > click Composite Master Reset to open the page.

In Composite Master Reset,

  1. Select the Master Instrument from the dropdown.
  2. Click Reset. This results in the deletion of all readings and blogs related to Master and all blogs related to its children. Then, recalculation of readings happens again automatically.
  3. Master Instruments Reset Log gets listed with the status of the operation displayed in the table. Status “processed” means recalculation is complete.

 

 

 

 

To watch the Web User Manual video on How to use Composite Master Reset, simply click on the thumbnail or link below:

videos.title: How To: Use Composite Master Reset
